channel.title: Magic On Shops
channel.description:
Could someone help me out with this bug?, i tried everything but nothing really helped..
i found a tut on making npcs with 0hp not attackable, but it didnt work, then i found out the the shops had 2k hp then i changed to 0, but still didnt work, could someone please please please, help me make it so that players wont me able to use magic on npcs with 0hp or attack them, shops are most attacked.
Credits and rewards.
Thanks ~ dell[br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2007, 12:08:35 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?, sorry for double post..

theirs one in the tut section, making an npc attackable[/quote]
